history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
TTS <speak> Great! I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. </speak>
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh.
TTS Where are you leaving from?
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university.
TTS When would you like to travel?
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 21 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions..
Walk for about 7 mins to Craig St at Park Plaza..
Take the 93 ,to Main St at Penn avenue It will depart at 2:47pm..
Walk for about 4 mins to 4401 Penn avenue..
TTS <speak>if you missed anything, please say repeat, else say continue</speak>
